rows.label: tlk70000032_04_msg0001
rows.name:
Since meeting Master Seiryu,
I feel closer to the Divine
Beasts than ever before.

rows.label: tlk70000032_04_msg0002
rows.name:
I feel like I really want to dig
down into this job, you know? Really
get to understand its importance.

rows.label: tlk70000032_04_msg0004
rows.name:
They say it illustrates the history
of humans and Divine Beasts.

rows.label: tlk70000032_04_msg0005
rows.name:
Nobody knows when it was made, but we
know that whoever made it must have
respected Divine Beasts just like we do.

rows.label: tlk70000032_04_msg0006
rows.name:
Looking at it, I really feel the
weight of all that history, and
my own place in it as well...

rows.label: tlk70000032_04_msg0007
rows.name:
So, if enemies threaten this
place again, I'm prepared to
lay down my life to defend it!
